description.narrative: This activity (Technical Assistance Fund) is a component of Rwanda Education Sector Program reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,808,214. This component benefits Rwanda, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Educational research. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, British Council, Education Development Trust, KPMG Rwanda, Mott MacDonald Limited, Oxford Policy Management, WYG International. The start date is 01-08-2011 and the end date is 30-06-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
